title: Biltong and cheese scones
ingredients: ['225g self raising flour', '1 teaspoon mustard powder', "1 teaspoon cayenne powder (or paprika if you don't do hot!)", '1/2 teaspoon salt', '50g butter', '30g biltong pieces - your favourite flavour, we used our sweet chilli', '50g grated Cheddar cheese', '150ml milk']
